UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial HPA3NT3 peptide analogs: placement of aromatic rings and positive charges are key determinants for cell selectivity and mechanism of action.
Literature.Author: Lee JK, Park SC, Hahm KS, Park Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=2µM),Proteus vulgaris KCTC 2433(MIC=4µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Listeria monocytogenes KCTC 3710(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2-4µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1998(MIC=4µM),Candida albicans KCTC 7270(MIC=8µM),Trichosporon beigelii KCTC 7707(MIC=16µM),Aspergillus awamori KCTC 6915(MIC=16µM),Aspergillus flavus KCTC 6905(MIC=16µM),Aspergillus fumigatus KCTC 6145(MIC=8µM),Aspergillus parasiticus KCTC 6598(MIC=8µM)
